TopicTitle: Bart Sibrel bothered the Apollo astronauts... This is the result

Articles.Content:
Okay, I must admit that this is the funniest thing that I've seen in a fair while.

Bart Sibrel is a conspiracy theorist who believes that the Apollo 11-17 (excluding 13, of course) never actually landed on the moon. Dumb, right? Well, he took foolishness to the next level and walked up to some the astronauts and "confronted them".

Maybe you've heard of him, maybe you haven't. I think you'll be delighted to know in any case that he was punched in the jaw by "Buzz" Aldrin.

The good stuff is the first 3 or so minutes of the film. This is funny stuff!

-Quick warning, this video has a little bit of cursing in it. But hey, who could blame these guys?-

https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=seWswwwvPE4#t=2

"Mr. Sibrel, knowing you, that's probably a fake Bible." -Neil Armstrong

"You want me to knock you in the head?" -John Young

"If you show this publicly, you're liable for a lawsuit. Mkay?" - "Buzz" Aldrin

Sibrel: You're a coward, and a liar, and a thi- -WHACK-

Edited March 23, 2014 by Maximus97
hahaha, yeah I hate that guy. My favourite is with Buzz.

Unfortunately, whether it starts off pro- or anti-, discussions of Apollo deniers always seem to degenerate into arguments, which is why the forum has reluctantly instituted a rule against discussing conspiracy theories (2.2.f). Closing the thread now.
